title: Regulation (EEC) No 428/73 of the Council of 5 February 1973 on the application of Decisions Nos 5/72 and 4/72 of the Association Council provided for by the Agreement establishing the Association between the European Economic Community and Turkey
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 428/73 OF THE COUNCIL  of 5 February 1973  on the application of Decisions Nos 5/72 and 4/72 of the Association Council provided for by the Agreement establishing the Association between the European Economic Community and Turkey
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
As regards the methods of administrative cooperation for implementation of Articles 2 and 3 of the Additional Protocol to the Agreement establishing an Association between the European Economic Community and Turkey and the definition of the concept of "originating products" from Turkey for implementation of the provisions of Chapter I of Annex No 6 of that Protocol, Decisions Nos 5/72 and 4/72 of the Association Council of 29 December 1972 (which are annexed to this Regulation) shall apply from the date of entry into force of the Additional Protocol.
The first subparagraph shall apply within the Community as originally constituted.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 February 1973.
For the Council
The President
R. VAN ELSLANDE  (1)OJ No 217, 29.12.1964, p. 3687/64.
